parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tread Separation Failure of Firestone SteelTex R4S Tires
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The tread separation failure of Firestone SteelTex R4S tires can cause sudden and complete loss of tire pressure, leading to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potential fatalities.
A malfunctioning cruise control system can cause the vehicle to accelerate uncontrollably, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The cruise control system fails to disengage when applying the brakes or pressing the button on the steering wheel
the vehicle continues to accelerate despite attempts to slow down
